name: VegaFina - Exclusivos - Conquistadores Portugal
additionalNotes:
Produced by Altadis U.S.A., home to some of the world’s most popular brands, VegaFina cigars are exceptionally well-made premium smokes that boast a very modest price tag. The original VF cigar is mellow to medium bodied, creamy smooth, and features an Ecuadorian Connecticut Shade wrapper an Indonesian 
Recent editions to this all-star lineup are the bold medium to full bodied VegaFina Nicaragua, and the VegaFina Sumum Edicion Especial 2010, and Especial 2013—two full flavored blends made with the finest aged vintage tobaccos. Vintage cigar lovers can also enjoy the VegaFina 1998 series made with deeply aged tobaccos from three nations covered by a stunning and oily 10-year old Ecuadorian wrapper.
